randomEvents.text: A lost traveler offers gold for his freedom...
Adventurers attempt to infiltrate your dungeon!
A demon offers a mysterious pact...

ruins.text: You discover a chest filled with ancient gold!
Bones of ancient heroes... their terror feeds your reputation.
A cursed gem pulses with malevolent energy...
You find only dust and regrets...

whispers.text: The whispers guide you to a secret cache... +60 gold!
The spirits share their knowledge... +6 reputation!
The voices fall silent, leaving you in silence...

depths.text: You discover a vein of black gold...

meditations: You meditate on the mysteries of darkness...
The shadows whisper ancient secrets to you...
Your connection to dark forces strengthens...
Malevolent energy flows through you like a black river...
combatScenarios: Your monsters strike from the shadows! The surprise is total.
The battle rages for hours. Your creatures show their superiority.
The defenders attempt heroic resistance, but your legions are relentless.
A crushing victory! The enemy flees, abandoning everything behind.
Your monsters spread terror with terrifying efficiency.

restEvents.text: Your monsters find gold while you sleep...
Your reputation grows in the shadows...
A peaceful night has restored you...
